Models¶

ResNet¶

class src.models.resnet_blocks.XResNetBlock(config: configs.main.config_template.DefaultConfig, expansion: int, n_inputs: int, n_filters: int, stride: int = 1, activation: torch.nn.modules.module.Module = ReLU(inplace=True))[source]¶

Creates the standard XResNet block.

Parameters

  • expansion¶ (int) – Model expantion

  • n_inputs¶ (int) – Number of inputs

  • n_filters¶ (int) – Number of filters

  • stride¶ (int) – controls the stride for the cross-correlation

  • activation¶ (torch.nn.Module) – Model activation function

class src.models.resnet_blocks.XResNet(expansion: int, layers_list: Tuple, config: configs.main.config_template.DefaultConfig)[source]¶

Creates the standard XResNet model.

Parameters

  • expansion¶ (int) – Model expantion

  • layer¶ (tuple) – TOADD

  • config¶ (DefaultConfig) – config with model parameters

Utils¶

src.models.utils.conv_layer(n_inputs: int, n_filters: int, kernel_size: int = 3, stride: int = 1, zero_batch_norm: bool = False, use_activation: bool = True, activation: torch.nn.modules.module.Module = ReLU(inplace=True), bias: bool = True) → torch.nn.modules.container.Sequential[source]¶

Creates a convolution block for XResNet.

Parameters

  • n_inputs¶ (int) – Number of inputs

  • n_filters¶ (int) – Number of filters

  • kernel_size¶ (int) – Size of convolutional kernel

  • stride¶ (int) – controls the stride for the cross-correlation

  • zero_batch_norm¶ (bool) – TOADD

  • use_activation¶ (bool) – TOADD

  • activation¶ (torch.nn.Module) – Model activation function

  • bias¶ (bool) – TOADD
